articles.description: Rajysa Sabha Elections 2022: The Rajya Sabha election will be held today to fill the 57 seats across the 15 states. The polls will be held for six seats from Maharashtra, two from Haryana and five each from Rajasthan and Karnataka.

articles.description: The conspiracy that drove a mob to attack the US Capitol in January 2021 still poses a threat to American democracy, the head of the congressional committee tasked with investigating the deadly riot will warn at the panel's first public hearing.
